title: Sales Support
job_overview:
Job Overview:
Are you an experienced Sales Support who thrives on customer satisfaction, order accuracy, and night shift productivity? We’re seeking a dedicated, detail-oriented, and tech-savvy team player to support our sales operations and provide VIP-level service to our clients—remotely, from the Philippines!

This is a graveyard shift (US EST) position for professionals who are reliable, organized, and driven to work independently while collaborating closely with a US-based team.

Key Responsibilities:
Answer inbound customer calls in a courteous and professional manner
Accurately process and manage customer orders in our system
Handle daily email communications with both customers and internal teams
Provide tailored support to VIP/high-value clients
Learn and understand our product catalog to make relevant recommendations
Generate accurate price estimates based on client needs
Request and manage product layout specifications as needed
Ensure clean, organized data entry and record maintenance

Qualifications:
Excellent English skills (spoken and written) – clear, confident, and professional
Bachelor’s degree in Business, Engineering, or related field preferred
Minimum 1 year of experience in a client-facing role (not limited to BPO or online-only support)
Proven ability to stay productive and alert during graveyard shifts
Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple priorities
Tech-savvy; experience with CRMs and order management tools is a plus
Quick learner with strong product comprehension and recommendation skills
Highly motivated, self-managed, and collaborative teaUpgrade to see actual infomber

Compensation & Benefits:
$500/month during the 1-month training period
$1000/month regular salary after training
Full-time, long-term opportunity
Work from home – no commute, more work-life balance
Supportive and professional team environment
Room for growth and development

Important Notes:
Graveyard Shift Required: Monday to Friday, 08:30 AM – 05:30 PM EST
You must have a reliable internet connection, working headset, and backup power/internet source
Applications without a resume and a short cover letter will not be considered
